item.title: uname Linux T-Shirt
item.description: Spread your love for Linux by showing the best output the uname command can give on your t-shirt.

item.title: Dont Drink and Root
item.description: A funny t-shirt for fans of Linux that suggests not to drink alcohol when working as the root user on your system, otherwise you may end up running the infamous rm -rf / command.

item.title: Close Windows and Run Linux
item.description: A funny t-shirt for fans of Linux that suggests to close Windows and run Linux instead to have a more joyful life when spending time with your computer.

item.title: Sysadmin Because Even Developers Need Heroes
item.description: A funny parody t-shirt for people who love the hard rock band AC/DC, the Unix operating system and working with a shell to interact with their computer.

item.title: Cool and Funny T-Shirts for Fans of Linux, Unix and FOSS
Unix Highway To Shell
item.description: A funny parody t-shirt for people who love the hard rock band AC/DC, the Unix operating system and working with a shell to interact with their computer.

item.title: Acer Chromebook R 11 CB5-132T-C8ZW
item.description: The Acer Chromebook R 11 CB5-132T-C8ZW is an 11.6-inch laptop powered by a 1.6 GHz dual-core Intel Celeron N3060 processor.

item.title: ASUS Chromebook Flip C100PA-DS03
item.description: The ASUS Flip C100PA-DS03 is a convertible Chromebook with an IPS touchscreen that can be flipped over from 0 to 360 degree so the device can be used as a tablet or laptop.

item.title: Acer Chromebook 14 CB3-431-C0AK
item.description: The Acer Chromebook 14 CB3-431-C0AK is a slim and lightweight laptop with a 14-inch full HD IPS display. It is equipped with a quad-core Intel Celeron N3160 processor, 4 GB RAM and 32 GB eMMC storage.

item.title: Acer Chromebook R 11 CB5-132T-C1LK
item.description: The Acer Chromebook R 11 CB5-132T-C1LK is an 11.6-inch laptop powered by a 1.6 GHz quad-core Intel Celeron N3150 Braswell processor.
